infoArray.name: data
infoArray.desc: (Go to Data Attributes for the detail) Data that drives the tree view. State-driven effects can be built by manipulating the attributes in this object. Also supports an array for multiple nodes at the root level.

infoArray.name: selectedNode
infoArray.desc: Sets the selected node that is currently selected.

infoArray.name: style
infoArray.desc: Sets the tree view styling. Defaults to src/themes/default.

infoArray.name: id
infoArray.desc: The component key. If not defined, an auto-generated index is used.

infoArray.name: name
infoArray.desc: The name prop passed into the Header component.

infoArray.name: children
infoArray.desc: The children attached to the node. This value populates the subtree at the specific node. Each child is built from the same basic data structure

infoArray.name: toggled
infoArray.desc: Toggled flag. Sets the visibility of a node's children. It also sets the state for the toggle decorator.

infoArray.name: active
infoArray.desc: Active flag. If active, the node will be highlighted.

infoArray.name: getValue()
infoArray.desc: Get the node that is currently selected.

infoArray.name: getValues()
infoArray.desc: Get the all nodes in side of tree view.

infoArray.name: expandAll()
infoArray.desc: Expand all nodes of the tree view.

infoArray.name: collapseAll()
infoArray.desc: Collapse all nodes of the tree view.

infoArray.name: onToggle
infoArray.desc: Callback function when a node is toggled / clicked. Passes 2 attributes: the data node and it's toggled boolean state.
